alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 16 at 7:26PM EDT until April 16 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CATTARAUGUS AND NORTHEASTERN CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES... At 725 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Fredonia, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Dunkirk, Fredonia, Gowanda, Silver Creek, SUNY Fredonia, Sheridan, Stockton, Dayton, Conewango and Ellington. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 58 and 59. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
